item.title: Book Review: Dragon Masters
item.description: This is Dragon Masters series. I would give it a rating of four stars, and it’s about a king who wants to keep his dragons a secret… So he…
item.dc:creator: Evan
item.content:encoded:
This is Dragon Masters series. I would give it a rating of four stars, and it’s about a king who wants to keep his dragons a secret… So he he has someone keep it a secret! But then… a dark wizard’s magic makes the sun dragon sick! Read the book # 2 to find out, and make sure to read book # 1 first!

There’s twelve books. Here are six:

item.title: Nature Walk
item.description: This is a beaver dam inside a lake. Most of these plants are buckthorn! Emerald Ashborers were chewing in these logs. I found a bug that…
item.dc:creator: Evan
item.content:encoded:
This is a beaver dam inside a lake.

Most of these plants are buckthorn!

Emerald Ashborers were chewing in these logs.

I found a bug that was on its back in some woodchips.

Can you spot the toad? #1

Can you spot the toad? #2

Here's the lake that had the beaver dam.

Here's a leaf that had a lot of bites in it.

Here's some vines that were growing.

Vines that grew for a long time. My mom cut these so they'll stop growing.

I saw this mushroom in some woodchips.

Here's some sick sap.

Seeds that got stuck to my pants.

Rings on a tree my dad cut down. You can count them to find out its age.

Here's some painted turtles. they're harmless.

Here's some flowers.

item.title: Latest Minecraft News
item.description: This is the grand house, made all out of planks, nothing else. Inside it is a bunk bed and a enchantment table. It also has a giant attic…
item.dc:creator: Evan
item.content:encoded:
This is the grand house, made all out of planks, nothing else. Inside it is a bunk bed and a enchantment table. It also has a giant attic with nothing. The rest of the bottom floor is just what a normal house has: a furnace, crafting table, anvil, and chests. it also has a iron golem on the roof.

This is me. I'm on the bottom of the splitscreen, and TheDude, my brother minecrafter, is on the top of the splitscreen.

item.title: Minecraft Intro
item.description: This is the jail. It's one of the smallest things in my village. My village is called FunIllage. This is the enchantment room. It's the…
item.dc:creator: Evan
item.content:encoded:
This is the jail. It's one of the smallest things in my village. My village is called FunIllage.

This is the enchantment room. It's the smallest thing in FunIllage.

This is the Firehouse. It has lots of undergroud things, like pools.

This is FunIllage.

This is my pet Meowy.

This is my pet Ruff.

item.title: New Website
item.description: Hello and welcome to T-INK! In this website, I'll be putting post up about the latest things that are happening! My Minecraft village…
item.dc:creator: Evan
item.content:encoded: Hello and welcome to T-INK! In this website, I'll be putting post up about the latest things that are happening! My Minecraft village, FunIllage, will amaze you with all of the underground things and portals! I hope you enjoy, and thank you for coming to T-INK!
